item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-26
item.description: Samsung’s new partnership offers another glimpse of a drone delivery future — in only one Irish town (2 minute read) Samsung has partnered with Irish drone delivery company Manna to bring drone delivery of small electronics like phones and smartwatches to a small town in Ireland.
